heading: austin powers shagadelic trivia
subheading: test your man of mystery knowledge while you wait for the spy who shagged me to open in us theaters.
author: wired news report
text: so you think you know all there is to know about '60s superspy austin powers and his arch-nemesis, dr. evil? test your knowledge with a new austin powers trivia game, baby! fans can download a shockwave demo of austin powers: operation trivia direct from the developer and at the official austin powers site at the end of may. a hybrid pc/mac cd-rom will hit stores the first week in june to coincide with opening of the film austin powers: the spy who shagged me.with original multimedia content, the game is "an immersive experience [for austin fans]," said a representative for berkeley systems.dr. evil has kidnapped austin powers and must play a trivia game to decide the fate of the world. players can choose sides -- playing austin power�s swinging sidekick or dr. evil�s fiendish protege -- to answer pop culture questions from the '60s, '70s, '80s, and '90s.tickets for the upcoming austin powers sequel will be available on america online starting 10 june, a day before its general release.trivia questions for the second film -- starring the original international man of mystery, mike myers, as both powers and dr. evil -- will not be available until 11 june.
